meanings.definition: A small flying insect known for biting humans and animals to feed on their blood.
meanings.sent1: I always wear bug spray to keep mosquitos away.
meanings.sent2: The mosquitos were buzzing around the campsite at night.
meanings.sent3: The mosquitos at the picnic seemed to enjoy my company a bit too much.
meanings.sent4: The mosquitos in the swamp were like tiny vampires in the night.
meanings.sent5: The sound of mosquitos in my room made it hard to sleep.
